name: Using function fn_my_permissions - Unsupported in Azure SQL Database

platformMigration.description: Using â€˜sys.fn_my_permissionsâ€™ is not a supported function in Azure SQL Database. It should be removed or replaced by an equivalent functions that is supported in Azure. When used on on-premise SQL databases, this function returns a list of the permissions effectively granted to the principal on a securable. A related function is HAS_PERMS_BY_NAME (which is supported on Azure SQL Database).
